function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Impact of COVID-19 on construction industry","Impact":"Supply shortage, material price fluctuations, legal issues, interruptions in contractual terms, uncertainty of survival, impact on research and technology","Mitigation":"Improved virtual alternatives, technology deployment, material planning, workplace design, collaboration, risk assessment, PPE emphasis, off-site works","Technologies":"Digital platforms, collaboration tools, virtual meeting software, material planning software, workplace design software, PPE technology","People":"Construction industry professionals","Owner":"Construction companies, industry organizations"},{"Description":"Negative impacts due to COVID-19","Impact":"Worsening project problems such as cost and schedule overruns, daily hardships faced by labor, ineffective work from home for site-based processes","Mitigation":"Improved work-from-home processes, labor support, schedule management tools, remote project management tools","Technologies":"Remote work platforms, project management software, scheduling tools","People":"Construction industry professionals, labor","Owner":"Construction companies, project managers"}]}
